channel.title: Comments on: Video Recording From A DSLR?

item.title: By: Canon Strikes Back Against The Nikon D90 » Gadgets, Photo » Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Canon Strikes Back Against The Nikon D90 » Gadgets, Photo » Russell Heimlich
item.description: [...] weeks ago Nikon launched the first DSLR with video capabilities. But today Canon unveiled the 5D Mark II, a worthy competitor. The 21.1 megapixel successor to the [...]
item.content:encoded: […] weeks ago Nikon launched the first DSLR with video capabilities. But today Canon unveiled the 5D Mark II, a worthy competitor. The 21.1 megapixel successor to the […]

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: I know! No longer will I need to hoist a dSLR and camcorder around my neck when I go out to capture moments. I haven't heard any issues about audio recording in movie mode with the D90. Probably isn't that good. On board mic if one is available at all.
item.content:encoded: I know! No longer will I need to hoist a dSLR and camcorder around my neck when I go out to capture moments. I haven’t heard any issues about audio recording in movie mode with the D90. Probably isn’t that good. On board mic if one is available at all.

item.title: By: Ajit

item.description: i am so pumped about this!!!
